document.full_text: the emergency manager appointed to put detroit's troubled public school system on a firmer financial footing said on thursday he was sending layoff notices to all of the district's 5,466 unionized employees.
document.title: detroit sends layoff notices to all public teachers
lines_and_colors: the emergency manager appointed to put detroit's troubled public school system on a firmer financial footing said on thursday he was sending layoff notices to all of the district's 5,466 unionized employees.
